job.title: Software Engineer - Backend
job.description: brpAt theCut we build technology for the culture Were shaping up the barber shop experience building tools that empower and embolden people to live their best lives With over 28 million appointments booked a community of tens of thousands of barbers and nearly 3 million users we are the goto platform for barber shopsppWe welcome people from all backgrounds who want the opportunity to create a future where everyone looks and feel their best Were building a culture thats different from the typical startup one that resonates with all of the things that are synonymous with urban barbershop culture  sports music community pop culture etc If youre curious passionate collaborative and want to join a culture that challenges you to be the best you come work with us and lets inspire confidence and clean cuts togetherppbrppstrongTHE ROLEstrongppAt theCut the brand loyalty weve maintained is born from true love of our product Users appreciate the care and craftsmanship that goes into each release We need you to help us continue to build the premier barbershop experience for our users Youll need to be a top notch problem solver with an edge  were adding tens of thousands of users every week so youll have to learn fast and be quick on your feetppWere looking for an Backend Engineer who will take a key role on our team You should have knowledge in all stages of software development Youll be working alongside our CTO and development team collaborating on the various layers of our backend servicesppbrppstrongTHEnbspRESPONSIBILITIESstrongpulliCollaborate with the product and engineering team to design implement and launch new features and productsliliFix bugs and address issues as they ariseliliMaintain code quality integrity and organizationliliDefine codify and establish the standards for high quality softwareliliStaying in the loop and on top of the latest standards changes trends in the software fieldliliConstantly be learning and developing your personal skillsliulpbrppstrongWHATnbspWEREnbspLOOKINGnbspFORstrongpulliBachelors degree in Computer Science or related fieldlili5 years experience in software developmentliliExperience with NodejsliliExperience with TypescriptliliExperience developing high quality scalablesecure backendsliliExperience with software testing techniquesliliProficient in GitliliAttention to detail and critical problem solving skillsliliExperience as an engineer in both an early stage startup and a fully scaled companyliliPassion for theCut and barbershop cultureliliYouve booked a haircut on theCutliulpbrppstrongBENEFITSstrongpulliGreat medical dental and vision insurance optionsliliStudent loan repayment planlili401k plan to help save for your futureliliUnlimited paid time offliliHealth and wellness stipendliliFree lunch and snacksliliFree company swagliliFree haircuts through theCutliulpbrpptheCut is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer that proudly pursues and hires a diverse workforce theCut does not make hiring or employment decisions on the basis of race color religion or religious belief ethnic or national origin nationality sex gender genderidentity sexual orientation disability age military or veteran status or any other basis protected by applicable local state or federal laws or prohibited by Company policy theCut also strives for a healthy and safe workplace and strictly prohibits harassment of any kind theCut adheres to all relevant state laws and local ordinances and its internal policy theCut will also consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction recordsp
